sentence: Israel  is  coming  under  mounting  criticism  for  its  actions  in  Gaza  where  more  than  11,000  people  have  been  killed,  according  to  Palestinian  officials,  the  vast  majority  of  them  civilians.
This  follows  Hamas'  attack  on  Israel  last  month  that  killed  around  1,200  people.
Some  50  civilians  were  killed  in  the  attack.
Speaking  to  reporters  in  New  Delhi,  Blinken  said,  "Far  too  many  Palestinians  have  been  killed.
